Starting at $1.00 - Reliable High Quality - Free Site Builder - 24/7 Support

We are here to offer you a great deal on our high quality shared hosting accounts. We give you friendly, personal customer
support. We try to know you by name. Whatever it is, we will do our best to satisfy your needs.

We own all of our servers and other equipment. We are hosted in Durham, NC in one of Tierpont's many tier III data centers.

24/7 monitoring system, 24/7 Support

Feel free to ask any questions here or email us at Sales@LittleCreekHosting.com

All shared hosting accounts come with the below:

  • No setup fees
  • 99.99% uptime SLA
  • 24/7 on-site technical support
  • No long-term contract. Monthly payment and you can cancel at any time.
  • Payments by credit/debit cards, Paypal
  • Unlimited MySQL Databases
  • Unlimited Hard Disk Space
  • Unlimited Email Accounts
  • Unlimited Content Management Systems
  • Free SSL Certificates
  • Free Site Builder
  • Free DirectAdmin Control Panel
  • Free Softaculous

These prices are not advertised anywhere on our web site. They can only be accessed from the links below.

We tried to make it easy to choose. The only difference between all of these plans is the number of web sites.
